pkgmetadata.longdescription: Tools for Analysing and Visualising Viva Insights Data // Opinionated functions that enable easier and faster analysis of Viva Insights data. There are three main types of functions in 'wpa': (i) Standard functions create a 'ggplot' visual or a summary table based on a specific Viva Insights metric; (2) Report Generation functions generate HTML reports on a specific analysis area, e.g. Collaboration; (3) Other miscellaneous functions cover more specific applications (e.g. Subject Line text mining) of Viva Insights data. This package adheres to 'tidyverse' principles and works well with the pipe syntax. 'wpa' is built with the beginner-to-intermediate R users in mind, and is optimised for simplicity.
